title: Historic Homeownership Revitalization Act of 2013
content: Historic Homeownership Revitalization Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow a new tax credit for 20 of rehabilitation expenditures for a historic home used as a principal residence, up to $60,000. And (2) increase the rehabilitation tax credit for residential rental property located in economically distressed areas with high construction costs.
